articles.title: Bon Appétit editor-in-chief Adam Rapoport resigns after brown face photo sparks anger - CNN
articles.description: Bon Appétit editor in chief Adam Rapoport stepped down on Monday over accusations of bias and a discriminatory culture at the Condé Nast-owned food magazine.
